pkgmetadata.longdescription: This software package provides FM synthesizer plugins based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. The emulations and the drivers are provided by libADLMIDI and libOPNMIDI.

use.flag: Build ADLplug, which emulates the Yamaha YMF262 chip.
Build OPNplug, which emulates the Yamaha YM2612 chip.
Build and install standalone JACK programs.
Build and install standalone ALSA programs.
Build with assertions despite being a release build.
